summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5786 for the construction of A trunk and lateral sewer known as the 24th Avenue Northeast, et al. Trunk Sewer under Ordinance No. 76327 as amended by Ordinance No. 76547, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
